# url

**Instance Property**

Returns the path displayed by the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var url: URL? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The path value.

## Setting the Path

- **clickedPathComponentCell**: Sets the value of the path displayed by the receiver.

items.description: Sets the value of the path displayed by the receiver.
